definition: and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs

sentences.english: Therefore choosing Hetian jade as national stone will gai…
sentences.chinese: 因此，和田玉被選爲國石是衆望所歸。

sentences.english: This book is talking about nephrite.
sentences.chinese: 這是本關於和田玉的書。

sentences.english: Nephrite is one of China's most five famous jades.
sentences.chinese: 和田玉是中國五大名玉之一。

sentences.english: The name of Hetian jade has been spread in China for ages, it has long history.
sentences.chinese: 和田玉是我國的傳統玉石，有悠久的歷史。

sentences.english: The vast majority of this jade is from Hetian, Xinjiang.
sentences.chinese: 這些玉絕大部分來自新疆，它們是和田玉。

sentences.english: Have you never heard about it ?
sentences.chinese: 難道你從沒聽說過和田玉？

sentences.english: They manipulate the religious sculpture market too.
sentences.chinese: 他們操縱緬甸和田玉宗教雕塑市場。

sentences.english: Nephrite is one of China's five most famous jade.
sentences.chinese: 和田玉是中國五大名玉之一。

definition: jade/jade and stone/(fig.) the good and the bad
sheep-fat white jade, a type of jade
lapis lazuli (mineral of the square albite family)
